member.name: IMFMuxStreamSampleManager.GetStreamConfiguration
member.summary: Gets the active stream configuration for the media source, which defines the set of substreams that are included the multiplexed output.
member.returns: Gets a bitmask value where the bits that are on represent the indices of the substreams that are included in the stream configuration.

member.name: IMFMuxStreamSampleManager.GetStreamCount
member.summary: Gets the count of substreams managed by the multiplexed media source.
member.param: The count of substreams managed by the multiplexed media source.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFMuxStreamSampleManager
member.summary: Provides the ability to retrieve objects for individual substreams within the output of a multiplexed media source.
